name: Bride and Groom Toasting Glasses
description: Add a unique twist to your next celebration with the brand new bride and groom toasting flutes from BeadedThings.  A great gift for the bridezilla who has already thought of everything.  Hand sculpted wire twists securly around the base which is adorned with stained glass gems.  Sold by the pair only – shipping is included in the price.

name: Wedding Favors
description: If you are looking for the perfect wedding favor…look no further. Your guests will be reminded of your special day every time they look at this beautiful charm. These also make great wedding shower favors, first Christmas keepsakes, or tied onto a bottle of 3 Buck Chuck.

name: Personalized Toasting Glasses
description: Add a unique twist to your next celebration with the brand new personalized toasting flutes from BeadedThings. Customize to suit any occasion – you pick your color and name or word hanging from the stem – Beaded Things does the rest. A great gift for the bride and groom, anniversary couple, new home owners, graduates, and more. Sold by the pair only.
